title: Health Monitoring and Daily Well-Being Support
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to monitor my health conditions and send me medication reminders, so that I can manage my arthritis pain and maintain my daily well-being independently.

title: Personalized Health Monitoring for Active Living
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to monitor my health and send me reminders for medications and physical activities so that I can stay healthy and active despite my arthritis and reduced mobility.

title: Timely Medication Reminders for Health Management
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to remind me to take my medication on time so that I can manage my health effectively and maintain my independence.

title: Emergency Alert for Safety and Independence
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to alert my family or caregivers in case of an emergency, so that I can feel safe and supported while maintaining my independence.

title: Accessible Health Dashboard for Older Adults
summary: As an older adult, I want an easy-to-navigate health dashboard that displays my health data and reminders so that I can manage my well-being and stay informed about my health conditions without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Tailored Health Tips for Active Living
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to provide personalized health tips based on my physical activity and health conditions so that I can stay active and manage my arthritis pain effectively.

title: Personalized Care Plans Tailored to User Feedback
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to create personalized care plans based on my feedback and health data so that I can receive the most effective support for my physical and cognitive needs.

title: Timely Health Check-Ins for Staying Active
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to provide timely health check-ins and reminders so that I can stay active and manage my arthritis pain effectively.

title: Health Monitoring Integration for Personalized Care and Alerts
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to monitor my health conditions and send alerts when necessary so that I can manage my health effectively and ensure my safety.
